widgets_values:
This is Chatterbox‚Äîand it just recreated my voice from a nine-second recording.

Give it a shot with your own voice and hear the results for yourself.

nodes.title: üéôÔ∏è Chatterbox Text-To-Speech
widgets_values:
Clone a voice from a short audio clip and generate new speech using a simple text prompt.

---

## Quick Start

**Input:** short voice clip  
**Output:** generated speech in the same voice

---

## Steps

### 1. Load a Voice
- Add an audio file to the **Load Audio** node  
- Even a **5‚Äì10 second** clip is enough  
- This clip is used as the voice reference

### 2. Enter Text
- Type what you want spoken in the **FL Chatterbox TTS** node  
- Write it as you‚Äôd naturally say it‚Äîpauses and punctuation matter

### 3. (Optional) Tweak Controls
- **Exaggeration** ‚Äî increases expressiveness  
- **CFG Weight** ‚Äî how tightly the voice follows the prompt  
- **Temperature** ‚Äî adds variation and naturalness  
_Default settings work well for first runs_

### 4. Generate
- Click **Run**  
- The generated audio will appear in **Save Audio (MP3)**

---

## Notes
- Clean, single-speaker recordings give the best results  
- Background noise can affect voice accuracy  
- Try small text changes to hear different inflections

---
